title: Learn Web Design in 2025 - Complete Guide
content:
Welcome to Modern Web Design

Web design has evolved tremendously. This guide will teach you everything from basics to advanced techniques.

Introduction Video

Watch this 10-minute introduction to understand the fundamentals of modern web design.

Core Principles

1. Visual Hierarchy

Visual hierarchy guides users through your content. Use size, color, and spacing to establish importance.

2. Color Theory

Choose colors that complement each other and align with your brand:

  • Primary color: Your main brand color
  • Secondary color: Supports the primary
  • Accent color: For call-to-action elements

3. Typography

Good typography makes content readable and beautiful. Follow these rules:

body {
  font-family: Georgia, serif;
  font-size: 18px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: #333;
}

Responsive Design Demo

Practice Project

Create a portfolio website using these principles. Start with a simple layout and gradually add complexity.

"Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works." - Steve Jobs
summary: Master modern web design principles with this comprehensive guide featuring video tutorials, code examples, and best practices.
author: Alex Chen
